physical_appearance:This is a photograph of a valley taken in between Banikhet
 Dalhousie in Punjab. The photograph shows a clearing with a small village in the middle of the valley
 There are several roofed houses
 with some plots of land in the foreground. There are a few hilltops in the background of the photograph. The title is written at the bottom
 below the photograph.

metadata.physical_appearance: This is a photograph of a valley taken in between Banikhet, Dalhousie in Punjab. The photograph shows a clearing with a small village in the middle of the valley, There are several roofed houses, with some plots of land in the foreground. There are a few hilltops in the background of the photograph. The title is written at the bottom, below the photograph.
